title: Learning Analytics and Educational Data Mining Using Ontology-Based Decision Trees

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis skills and understanding of educational assessment methodologies
context.additional_context: Emphasizing educational approaches implementable in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, considering workplace applicability for current secondary education practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the structure of ontology-based decision tree models and propose implementation strategies for educational data analysis.
Execute procedures to integrate domain-specific predictive rules into ontologies using SWRL (Semantic Web Rule Language).
Design a learning analytics model project considering data portability across diverse curricula.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
